alert.note: Alert for Bent; Las Animas; Otero (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 26 at 3:29PM MDT until May 26 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Otero County in southeastern Colorado... Northeastern Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... Southwestern Bent County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 328 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles south of Timpas, or 26 miles southwest of La Junta, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Otero, northeastern Las Animas and southwestern Bent Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
